languages.text: "Достойный ответ слуги Бога-Императора! Мы найдем управу на эту ересь".
"An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."
languages.original_text: "Достойный ответ слуги Бога-Императора! Мы найдем управу на эту ересь".

traits.locale_text: "An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."
"An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."
"An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."
"An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."
"An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."
"An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."

languages.text: “这才是神皇的仆人该有的回答！我们会想办法消灭这群异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."

traits.locale_text: “这才是神皇的仆人该有的回答！我们会想办法消灭这群异端分子。”

languages.text: «¡Una respuesta digna de un sirviente del Dios Emperador! Encontraremos la manera de controlar esta herejía».
languages.original_text: "An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."

traits.locale_text: «¡Una respuesta digna de un sirviente del Dios Emperador! Encontraremos la manera de controlar esta herejía».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下の従者にふさわしい答えだ！この異端を対処する方法を見つけよう」
languages.original_text: "An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下の従者にふさわしい答えだ！この異端を対処する方法を見つけよう」

languages.text: « Voilà une réponse digne d'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Nous trouverons un moyen de mater cette hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà une réponse digne d'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Nous trouverons un moyen de mater cette hérésie. »

languages.text: "Eine Antwort, die eines Dieners des Gottimperators würdig ist! Wir werden einen Weg finden, mit dieser Ketzerei umzugehen."
languages.original_text: "An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Antwort, die eines Dieners des Gottimperators würdig ist! Wir werden einen Weg finden, mit dieser Ketzerei umzugehen."

languages.text: "İmparator'un hizmetkârına yaraşır bir cevap. Bu kâfirlikle başa çıkmanın bir yolunu bulacağız."
languages.original_text: "An answer worthy of the God-Emperor's servant! We shall find a way to handle this heresy."
